map
Class Countries

java.lang.Object
  map.Countries
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Countries
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Countries stores a list of countries that make up the map.

See Also:
Serialized Form
